trans-unit.source: Represents a type that has its lifetime controlled by the workflow runtime.
trans-unit.target: Representa um tipo que tem o seu tempo de vida controlado pelo tempo de execução de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: Types derived from Handle have their lifetimes controlled by the workflow runtime.
trans-unit.target: Tipos derivados de identificador tem suas vidas úteis controladas pelo tempo de execução de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: For workflow variables of handle types, the runtime uses the required default constructor to create an instance of the type, assigns it to the <xref:System.Activities.Variable>, and calls <xref:System.Activities.Handle.OnInitialize%2A> when initializing the environment.
trans-unit.target: Para variáveis de fluxo de trabalho dos tipos de identificador, o tempo de execução usa o construtor padrão necessários para criar uma instância do tipo e o atribui para a <xref:System.Activities.Variable>e chama <xref:System.Activities.Handle.OnInitialize%2A>ao inicializar o ambiente.</xref:System.Activities.Handle.OnInitialize%2A> </xref:System.Activities.Variable>

trans-unit.source: When the variable goes out of scope, <xref:System.Activities.Handle.OnUninitialize%2A> is called.
trans-unit.target: Quando a variável sai do escopo, <xref:System.Activities.Handle.OnUninitialize%2A>é chamado.</xref:System.Activities.Handle.OnUninitialize%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Activities.Handle"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Activities.Handle"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Classes that derive from <xref:System.Activities.Handle> must provide a default constructor.
trans-unit.target: Classes que derivam de <xref:System.Activities.Handle>deve fornecer um construtor padrão.</xref:System.Activities.Handle>

trans-unit.source: Gets the name to be used by this <xref href="System.Activities.Handle"></xref> when added to an activity’s execution properties.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o nome a ser usado por este <xref href="System.Activities.Handle"> </xref> quando adicionada às propriedades de execução de uma atividade.

trans-unit.source: The name of derived type as provided by <xref:System.Type.FullName*>.
trans-unit.target: O nome do tipo derivado como fornecida pelo <xref:System.Type.FullName*>.</xref:System.Type.FullName*>

trans-unit.source: Called by the workflow runtime when the environment that contains the <xref href="System.Activities.Handle"></xref> is initialized.
trans-unit.target: Chamado pelo tempo de execução do fluxo de trabalho quando o ambiente que contém o <xref href="System.Activities.Handle"> </xref> é inicializado.

trans-unit.source: The environment in which the handle is being created.
trans-unit.target: O ambiente no qual o identificador é criado.

trans-unit.source: Called by the workflow runtime when the <xref href="System.Activities.Variable"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Activities.Handle"></xref> goes out of scope.
trans-unit.target: Chamado pelo tempo de execução do fluxo de trabalho quando o <xref href="System.Activities.Variable"> </xref> para o <xref href="System.Activities.Handle"> </xref> sai do escopo.

trans-unit.source: The environment in which the handle was created.
trans-unit.target: O ambiente no qual o identificador foi criado.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Activities.ActivityInstance"></xref> that contains the <xref href="System.Activities.Variable"></xref> that contains the <xref href="System.Activities.Handle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.Activities.ActivityInstance"> </xref> que contém o <xref href="System.Activities.Variable"> </xref> que contém o <xref href="System.Activities.Handle"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The activity instance that contains the <xref href="System.Activities.Variable"></xref> that contains the <xref href="System.Activities.Handle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A instância de atividade que contém o <xref href="System.Activities.Variable"> </xref> que contém o <xref href="System.Activities.Handle"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Throws an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> if the <xref href="System.Activities.Handle"></xref> has not been initialized.
trans-unit.target: Gera um <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>se o <xref href="System.Activities.Handle"> </xref> não foi inicializado.</xref:System.InvalidOperationException>

trans-unit.source: ThrowIfUninitialized gives custom handle derived class authors a convenient method to call from any methods or properties of the derived class that are not valid if the <xref:System.Activities.Handle> is uninitialized.
trans-unit.target: ThrowIfUninitialized fornece a autores de classe derivado de identificador personalizado um método conveniente para chamar a partir de qualquer métodos ou propriedades da classe derivada que não são válidas se o <xref:System.Activities.Handle>não foi inicializado.</xref:System.Activities.Handle>
